programme.title: Red Headed Stranger
programme.desc: Revisionist western about fallen preacher Shay, who guns down his wife Raysha for running off with another man. Wandering, he meets single mom Laurie; however, helpless sheriff Scoby wants Shay to help him fight the villainous Clavers.

programme.title: Harry Tracy
programme.desc: The last survivor (Bruce Dern) of Butch Cassidy's gang turns the century with an artist (Michael C. Gwynne) and a judge's daughter (Helen Shaver).

programme.title: Windwalker
programme.desc: An old Cheyenne warrior (Trevor Howard) comes back to life to save his family and a twin son (Nick Ramus), abducted by the Crow.

programme.title: Range Rider
programme.desc: A crooked cattle buyer collects antique dueling pistols.

programme.title: Trigger Fingers
programme.desc: Valley rustlers frame a G-man (Tim McCoy) who is posing as a Gypsy.

programme.title: The Star Packer
programme.desc: Marshal John Travers investigates the murder of a town's sheriff, makes it his mission to restore order to the town and bring down a bandit called the Shadow.

programme.title: The Trail Beyond
programme.desc: Rod Drew (John Wayne) is asked to search for missing people in Canada, and quickly finds out a gang of French Canadian outlaws have been kidnapping people.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: When a neighbor agrees to sell his property, the Cartwrights fear the loss of water rights for their cattle.

programme.title: Range Rider
programme.desc: A corrupt mayor frames the Rider for a rancher's murder.

programme.title: Range Rider
programme.desc: An unconscious little girl leads to a deadly horse-rustling gang.

programme.title: Range Rider
programme.desc: Outlaws kidnap a stage-line owner to take over the line.

programme.title: Range Rider
programme.desc: A mining engineer finds copper ore on an Indian burial ground.

programme.title: Range Rider
programme.desc: A dishonest casino manager kills the property's eccentric owner.

programme.title: Range Rider
programme.desc: A corrupt sheriff's gang seizes every shipment of a silver-jeweler.

programme.title: Range Rider
programme.desc: A corrupt Indian agent frames a Cherokee chief for horse theft.

programme.title: Range Rider
programme.desc: Bandits seek a map revealing hidden treasure in a mission.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Outlaws terrorize ranchers near Maverick; Buck Grant, using the disguise of the Phantom Rider, battles against bandits.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Buck escapes death by rolling under a water trough a split second before the dynamite explosion; Spooky tells Buck a crooked deal is planned.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Bucks seems trapped in the burning jail; he whistles for Silver, who wrenches the bars loose and Buck escapes.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Buck comes to the surface of the lake and swims ashore with Mary; Silver meets his master and they start for the ranch chased by outlaws.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Buck and Silver land on a jutting shelf of rock below the top of the precipice; Buck gives the wallet, which he took from the safe, to Judge Holmes.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: The bandits drag Buck with them; he gets away on Silver; the captured outlaws try to escape from the sheriff and one of them is shot.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Buck shoots the gun from his assailant's hand after dropping to the floor to dodge the bullets; next day Buck learns a railroad man is coming to town.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Buck is cornered by renegades in the cave; Silver lashes out with his heels and Buck rides away, chased by outlaws.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Buck leaps to his saddle and dashes away; Blake is badly injured, and Mary's papers are gone; The Phantom later sends her a note saying they are safe.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Cowboys rescue Mary and Buck; rustlers steal all Mary's cattle, her only source of money, when she has to meet a note at the bank.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: A fight breaks out between settlers and natives over their shooting ability; Buck bursts from the closet carrying Mary and rushes her to their horses.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Spooky rescues Buck; Mary assures Hudson that Buck is trustworthy; Hudson reveals a secret to both of them.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Buck grabs Mary and leaps to safety in the mine tunnel, avoiding the explosion; Hudson returns from pursuing the renegade.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Buck rolls down an embankment and out of the path of the galloping horses; Buck rides off and the bandits head for Hudson's ranch after the gold.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Buck sees Roscoe in the nick of time; Roscoe is jailed; cowboys drive off his henchmen; Mary is thrown from her horse.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: A Denver widow (Conchata Ferrell) with a daughter becomes a Scottish rancher's (Rip Torn) housekeeper in 1910 Wyoming.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Pat and his cousin inherit some land that is coveted by some unscrupulous ranchers.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Roy saves a group of archeological students taken hostage by robbers.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: An outlaw gang tries to steal an old prospector's life savings.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: An outlaw gang assigns an orphaned teenager (Harry Harvey, Jr.) the task of murdering Roy.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Roy debunks an old Western legend about a one-armed ghost.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: A government agent is killed after he orders a stop to beaver trapping in the region.
